recipe.title: Yeasted Buckwheat Waffles
ingredients: 2 1/4 teaspoons or 1 package active dry yeast
5 tablespoons canola oil or butter, melted
instructions: In a small bowl, sprinkle the yeast into 1/4 cup warm water and stir in the sugar. Let stand until foamy, about 10 minutes. Put the warm milk and salt in a large bowl, then add the yeast mixture and whisk in the flours. Cover and refrigerate overnight if the weather is warm or leave out on the counter if it's cool. Next morning, add the sugar, oil, eggs, and soda. Cook according to your waffle iron's instructions.
